Name: Habitat for Humanity
Description: Habitat for Humanity builds affordable housing for those in need, aiming to eliminate poverty housing and homelessness.

Name: UNICEF
Description: The United Nations Children's Fund provides humanitarian and developmental aid to children worldwide.

Name: World Wildlife Fund WWF
Description: WWF focuses on environmental conservation, protecting endangered species,	and reducing the human impact on the environment.

Name: Red Cross/Red Crescent
Description: These organizations provide emergency assistance, disaster relief, and education in communities worldwide.

Name: Amnesty International
Description: Amnesty International campaigns for human rights and works to protect individuals wherever justice, freedom, truth, and dignity are denied.

Name: Doctors Without Borders Médecins Sans Frontières
Description: This organization delivers emergency medical aid to people affected by conflict, epidemics, disasters, or exclusion from healthcare.

Name: The Nature Conservancy
Description: Focused on conserving the lands and waters on which all life depends, The Nature Conservancy tackles climate change, protects lands and waters, and provides food and water sustainably.

Name: Save the Children
Description: Save the Children works in the U.S. and around the world to give children a healthy start in life, the opportunity to learn, and protection from harm.

Name: Oxfam International
Description: Oxfam works to alleviate global poverty, fighting inequality to end poverty and injustice.

Name: World Food Programme WFP
Description: WFP is the leading humanitarian organization saving lives and changing lives, delivering food assistance in emergencies, and working with communities to improve nutrition and build resilience.

Name: Plan International
Description: Plan International advances children's rights and equality for girls all over the world.

Name: International Rescue Committee IRC
Description: The IRC responds to the world's worst humanitarian crises, helping people to survive, recover, and gain control of their future.

Name: Operation Smile
Description: Operation Smile provides free cleft surgeries to children and adults around the world.

Name: Heifer International
Description: Heifer International works to end hunger and poverty in a sustainable way by supporting and investing alongside local farmers and their communities.

Name: Pencils of Promise
Description: Pencils of Promise builds schools and increases educational opportunities in the developing world.

Name: Charity: Water
Description: Charity: Water brings clean and safe drinking water to people in developing countries.

Name: Room to Read
Description: Room to Read focuses on literacy and gender equality in education in low income communities.

Name: Kiva
Description: Kiva provides microloans to entrepreneurs in underserved communities to help alleviate poverty.

Name: International Volunteer HQ IVHQ
Description: IVHQ offers volunteer abroad programs in various fields like education, health, and conservation.

Name: Teach for All
Description: Teach for All is a global network of independent organizations working to expand educational opportunity in their countries.

Name: WaterAid
Description: WaterAid works to make clean water, decent toilets, and good hygiene normal for everyone, everywhere.

Name: Project HOPE
Description: Project HOPE delivers health education, disaster relief, and health system strengthening around the world.

Name: Special Olympics
Description: Special Olympics provides yearround sports training and athletic competition for children and adults with intellectual disabilities.

Name: WWOOF World Wide Opportunities on Organic Farms
Description: WWOOF connects volunteers with organic farmers and growers to promote cultural and educational experiences based on trust and nonmonetary exchange.

Name: Global Vision International GVI
Description: GVI runs high impact volunteer programs across the globe, focusing on conservation, education, and community development.

Name: Mercy Corps
Description: Mercy Corps helps people in the world's toughest places survive the crises they confront and turn them into opportunities for progress.

Name: Action Against Hunger
Description: Action Against Hunger works to save the lives of malnourished children while providing communities with access to safe water and sustainable solutions to hunger.

Name: GlobalGiving
Description: GlobalGiving connects donors with grassroots projects around the world to make a high impact.

Name: Earthwatch
Description: Earthwatch engages people in scientific field research and education to promote the understanding and action necessary for a sustainable environment.

Name: CrossCultural Solutions
Description: CrossCultural Solutions provides volunteer programs in health, education, and social services in communities around the world.

Name: International Volunteer Programs Association IVPA
Description: IVPA provides resources and connections for individuals seeking international volunteer opportunities.

Name: Peace Corps
Description: While typically for older volunteers, the Peace Corps offers some opportunities for younger students to get involved through their programs and partnerships.

Name: Crossroads Foundation
Description: Crossroads Foundation connects those in need with those who can help through distribution of donated goods and providing simulation experiences for volunteers.

Name: United Nations Volunteers UNV
Description: UNV mobilizes volunteers to serve in UN programs and initiatives worldwide, including opportunities for youth.

Name: GoEco
Description: GoEco offers volunteer opportunities in various fields such as wildlife conservation, community development, and environmental preservation.

Name: Projects Abroad
Description: Projects Abroad offers a wide range of international volunteer programs tailored to young people, including high school students.

Name: Youth Challenge International YCI
Description: YCI creates youth development and empowerment programs focused on health, the environment, and education.

Name: Volunteer Forever
Description: Volunteer Forever helps connect people with volunteer programs and provides resources for fundraising and planning international volunteer trips.

Name: Volunteers for Peace VFP
Description: VFP offers affordable and meaningful volunteer opportunities in over 100 countries.

Name: Volunteering Solutions
Description: Volunteering Solutions offers a variety of volunteer programs in fields like healthcare, childcare, education, and conservation.

Name: Outreach360
Description: Outreach360 provides volunteer opportunities focused on education and community development in Latin America.

Name: Global Volunteers
Description: Global Volunteers offers volunteer programs that focus on community development and cultural exchange.

Name: Raleigh International
Description: Raleigh International engages volunteers in sustainable development projects focused on environmental conservation and community resilience.

Name: African Impact
Description: African Impact offers volunteer projects focused on wildlife conservation, community upliftment, and environmental sustainability in Africa.

Name: AIESEC
Description: AIESEC provides young people with leadership development, crosscultural internships, and volunteer exchange experiences across the globe.

Name: Street Child
Description: Street Child works to improve the lives of vulnerable children through education, child protection, and sustainable livelihoods programs.

Name: International Student Volunteers ISV
Description: ISV offers volunteer programs focused on conservation and community development, combined with adventure travel.

Name: Sustainable Bolivia
Description: Sustainable Bolivia supports sustainable development and community projects, offering various volunteer opportunities.

Name: The Borgen Project
Description: The Borgen Project fights global poverty and offers volunteer opportunities for advocacy and fundraising.

Name: SE7EN
Description: SE7EN offers volunteer opportunities in conservation, healthcare, and education across various countries.

Name: World Teach
Description: World Teach places volunteer teachers in developing countries to improve education standards.

Name: Conservation Volunteers International Program CVIP
Description: CVIP focuses on environmental conservation and restoration projects around the world.

Name: Global Citizen Year
Description: Global Citizen Year offers gap year programs that combine international volunteering with leadership development.

Name: Build Abroad
Description: Build Abroad focuses on construction projects, building and repairing homes, schools, and other structures in developing communities.

Name: VSO Voluntary Service Overseas
Description: VSO brings people together to fight poverty through volunteer work, focusing on education, health, and livelihoods.

Name: Youth With A Mission YWAM
Description: YWAM is a global movement of Christians from many cultures and age groups dedicated to serving Jesus throughout the world.

Name: Globe Aware
Description: Globe Aware designs short term volunteer programs that promote cultural awareness and sustainability.

Name: United Planet
Description: United Planet offers international volunteer programs that focus on healthcare, education, environmental sustainability, and social development.

Name: CISV International
Description: CISV International promotes peace and cross cultural understanding through educational programs for youth.

Name: Cross Cultural Experience
Description: Cross Cultural Experience provides volunteer programs that emphasize community service and cultural exchange.
